Reviews.Title: Battery life less than 12 hours
Reviews.Author: mark loseke
Reviews.Content: I had Verizon shut off the mobile data to this phone and the battery still would not last 12 hours.

Reviews.Title: Love this phone!
Reviews.Author: kenziek
Reviews.Content: I love this phone, it's a pretty orange color and you can throw it around and drop it a million times. I love the big digital clock on the front and the front speaker is very loud. The only problem is that I use it a lot and the battery drains pretty quick. I would order the extended battery with it if you use your phone a lot. Other than that this phone is simple AND indestructible! I love it!

Reviews.Title: not half bad
Reviews.Author: robert engesser
Reviews.Content: The phone is okay but you can only receive in and outgoing calls.  There is no way to get ring tones or anything extra from verizon because it is an old phone and there is nothing they can do.  So if you just want a phone for phone calls this is for you

Reviews.Title: Good Phone, Bad battery
Reviews.Author: Hopper
Reviews.Content: Please read this before continuing to purchase from OEM Battery Depot. I got this phone as a replacement for the pantech Jest 2 (which is an awful phone by the way, broke after 3 days) and I had 2 weeks to return it after i bought it in case something went wrong with the phone which iv'e already mentioned. By the time I received this replacement phone I only had 6 days to send back the pantech or risk being caught in a 2 year contract with a worthless phone. Upon receiving it the battery would not fit in and the Verizon store near my home informed me that they had sent an out of date battery with the phone. I read one more review where a woman complained of this same problem so it is clear that this is not just a one time mess up. Please learn from this mistake.

Reviews.Title: Buy this if you need a tough phone!!
Reviews.Author: ALYCE P.
Reviews.Content: Wow! Awesome phone!!! I ordered this phone to replace a black one I bought from Verizon 5 years ago. That one still worked but looked as if it had done 3 tours with the Marines in Afghanistan! This one is prettier. Being a woman, I like the metallic orange color. It took Verizon exactly five minutes on the phone to activate my new phone! I received my phone quickly and it's more than I hoped for!!

Reviews.Title: Replacement phone
Reviews.Author: The Judge
Reviews.Content: Not nearly the phone the GZONE Type S it replaced but it'll have to suffice. Just like everything else i guess, the newer the cheaper.

Reviews.Title: Doesn't live up to name
Reviews.Author: Liberty girl 2 u
Reviews.Content: Speaker sound was really bad.  Rubber cover for charge port came off the second day.Chipped easily.  Just didn't meet expectations.Casio G'zOne Boulder Cell Phone for Verizon Wireless in Black/Silver with Front Speaker - No Contract Required

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: drgreen19677
Reviews.Content: when you need a phone that does not require a data package this is the one to get. easy to use, rugged and a nice looking phone.

Reviews.Title: Great Condition
Reviews.Author: Mark Shumaker
Reviews.Content: This phone was just what was advertised. Just a simple phone that is rugged and durable. I definitely would order again.

Reviews.Title: GREAT phone
Reviews.Author: vincent ellis
Reviews.Content: this is my second one of these last one still works but its about 5 years old and is a little worse for wear

Reviews.Title: good, sturdy dumb phone with fatal flaws
Reviews.Author: ckek
Reviews.Content: My old G'zone type S lasted seven years before getting glitchy with the computer parts. It survived lake swims, hot tub dunkings, the washing machine, getting run over in the mud, and several drops down a flight of stairs. I replaced it with the Boulder purely for the camera upgrade.Two things, there is no such thing as a new one of these phones."New" means "used with a sticker on it". Since my previous experience with a g'zone phone was so good, I thought I'd take my chances with a used phone. The first one I had died after 45 hours when used outdoors during a light rain. Verizon said this voided their warranty, because even though the phone is specifically sold as "milspec" water resistant to immersion to a depth of one meter, Verizon does not warranty it as such, rendering that a point of blatant, unapologetic false advertising. I bought a second one figuring I would just treat it as a delicate, normal phone. It lasted a few months, then the charger port fell out.The actual charger port fell out. Like, it was just Elmer's glued in, and fell out still attached to the cord. Googling around, it seems that's a common problem with this model.I'm not a cheapskate, I would pay for a new phone that is as sturdy as my old type S. I don't want a smart phone, and I don't want to pay Verizon $200 for the new g'zone when its not warrantied for what it's advertised as?This phone is ok. It's marginally sturdier than the average clamshell phone, but be sure to keep it dry, and use the optional charging dock.

Reviews.Title: Casio G'zOne Boulder
Reviews.Author: Curt Lange
Reviews.Content: It was everything they said it was.  Activated no problem.  Unintentional got it wet and continued working as if it never happened.

Reviews.Title: Doesn't hold a charge well.
Reviews.Author: Joanne M. Hughes
Reviews.Content: I got this phone as an "emergency" phone for my rambunctious 10 yr old son.  I had high hopes because it is "rugged".  However, I ended up returning it because even though it was new, it would only hold a charge for about an hour.  Yikes.  On the plus side, the vendor was very helpful in issuing a refund.

Reviews.Title: Good purchase
Reviews.Author: Eddie.C
Reviews.Content: Purchased this phone for my 13 year old nephew. Its holding up to his abuse. Enough said . Can't go wrong.

Reviews.Title: consumers beware!
Reviews.Author: Average Consumer "Consumer"
Reviews.Content: I jumped on the chance to have an orange phone but it was a lemon. The phone battery charged once.  On connecting to recharge, the battery discharged completely after 5 hrs being connected.  I put in another battery and it charged once and then couldn't be recharged. I had the batteries checked and they were perfectly OK.  I got another charger but was still unable to charge the phone.  I finally purchased another model from Verizon and asked them to transfer the contacts but after trying 3 times they couldn't do it.  The sales person said the phone was defective.  BTW the phone is an older generation model and does not use a USB mini cable.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: ernest moot sr.
Reviews.Content: I really like this phone, I've had a boulder for years, & like anything else, nothing lasts for ever, so I purchased another & it works great, thanks again.

Reviews.Title: its a sturdy phone, but there are a few issues.
Reviews.Author: lohn states
Reviews.Content: I like how sturdy the phone is. Ive dropped it a few times and its build to take a beating. However, the battery doesnt last very long, and the connector that charges the phone came apart.

Reviews.Title: how i use my phone
Reviews.Author: darlene
Reviews.Content: My husband is a surveyor and he needed a phone that is rugged and water proof because some of the job sites he works on are in swamps

Reviews.Title: the phone  quit after one day
Reviews.Author: randy
Reviews.Content: because we had it one day  and it got wet  and did not work after that and was suppose to have been water proof.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: karen ledford
Reviews.Content: Good sturdy phone for husband who drops his regulary had a similar one went with Color so not to get lost in grass

Reviews.Title: worthless
Reviews.Author: angela jones
Reviews.Content: charger plug is poorly soldered, came loose inside phone within one week of purchase. cannot charge phone -unable to use.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Brenda S
Reviews.Content: Bought this to rid myself from being tethered to a data plan.  I only use it to answer and make calls with the occasional text.  Even had the VM turned off.  Phone works great - no complaints at all.  The fact it is ruggedized help make my decision.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Sandra
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my husband who always seemed to drown or drop his phone. This phone has been through craziness and still works great. I even washed it and dried it in the laundry and he could still get calls after!

Reviews.Title: phone is junk....
Reviews.Author: mark
Reviews.Content: i had the same phone that never quit working even after it fell off of my deck into the pool and stayed there for 2 days untill my daughter found it .it fell out of my pocket in the winter and was in a snow pile overnight and it never stoped working.so i bought my son the same phone,and it is junk,the window is so cloudy you cant see through it its all nicked up,i had to buy another batt cause it didnt stay charged for more then 10 min,then after 3 days it just quit working.

Reviews.Title: Casio G'zOne Boulder
Reviews.Author: Ray Browning
Reviews.Content: The phone would not hold a charge.  I had to charge it up over night to keep the charge until 4 PM the next day.  I did not use it over thirty minutes the entire day and it lost its charge.  Also, after three weeks, the phone would not work.

Reviews.Title: Liked phone, just couldn't get to work properly.
Reviews.Author: Lisa A. Harmon
Reviews.Content: I couldn't get the battery in the phone, so I took it to a Verizon store and they also could not get the battery in so I had to return it because I was going out of town and needed a phone ASAP. I really liked the phone, just couldn't get the battery in.

Reviews.Title: Boulder Front Speaker Phone
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: Upon receiving the boulder I found that it does not have the capability to download saved contacts from verizon a little upsetting, had to manually type in all saved phone numbers. The speaker is average in sound , found that my handy ravine is clearer and louder.Will use this phone as a secondary backup in the event my current experiences tragedy in the work field.OEM backed their guarantees on operation of the product and were most helpful remedying sending a replacement unit as the first boulder I ordered had a gliche.....

Reviews.Title: great phone.
Reviews.Author: hhhhj
Reviews.Content: I love the new phone, meet my working  on construction spectations in the rain, snow, cold, hot or icy . But 1 tiny problen the post say with flashlight and I can't find it on my phone and I look everywhere but can't  find it,

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: craig h saunders
Reviews.Content: this is a great phone - very rugged and this one had a camera - use them in my business and give them to the techs in the field since they seem like they last forever.  if they would only make a smart phone this rugged

Reviews.Title: Casio phone
Reviews.Author: tamara hodges
Reviews.Content: Bought this phone for my husband for Christmas and he loves it! He said it's the best phone. Definetly a good buy.

Reviews.Title: G'zOne Boulder greatness
Reviews.Author: NicoleS
Reviews.Content: Great phone works well for my dad who's always dropping it . Heavy duty which he needed because he's always working .

Reviews.Title: casio phone
Reviews.Author: ct
Reviews.Content: used phone looks brand new. no problems at all activating it. it is in perfect condition. I am very happy with the service.I also got it very fast

Reviews.Title: best phone
Reviews.Author: dannie welsh
Reviews.Content: my dad wont use anything but this phone and his last one got ran over, fell in pond many time and just kept working... the screen got very scratched up so we got him a new one for fathers day...... best water proof phone....

Reviews.Title: it sucks
Reviews.Author: Thomas Matthews
Reviews.Content: nothing about it is good.  i wish I kept the packing and receipts so i can return it.if i could send it back i would

Reviews.Title: Phone
Reviews.Author: just4jesus
Reviews.Content: I got this Cazio Boulder it works fine BUT I AM HAVING TROUBLE GETTING THE PHONE ACCITVATED CALLED MY CARRIER THEY SAID AMAZON HAS A CONTRACT I HAVE TO SIGN TO ACTIVATE THE PHONE HAVENT FIGURED OUT YET WHERE TO CALL TO GET THE PHONE ACTIVATED.

ProductInfo.Features:
Ruggedized clamshell phone that's shock-, dust-, and water-resistant; can be immersed underwater up to 1 meter
Talk instantly to friends and colleagues using Verizon's Push to Talk; compatible with VZ Navigator directions, V CAST Music and Video downloads, and Field Force Manager service
Digital audio player; Bluetooth for handsfree communicatnoi and stereo music; MicroSD expansion to 8 GB (MEMORY CARD NOT INCLUDED)
Up to 3.6 hours of talk time, up to 63 hours (2.6 days) of standby time
Your purchase will include a Cell Phone, Rechargable Battery, and Wall Charger
ProductInfo.Name: Casio G'zOne Boulder for Verizon Wireless (Orange) Front Speaker - Camera - Rugged - Water Resistant
